snippet: The collapsed section raised new doubts about the quality of work and training on the high-speed rail system, one of China’s most ambitious modernizations.
abstract: China's troubled state-run rail system suffers another setback with news that a section of railway that already had undergone test runs has collapsed; episode threatens to raise new doubts about the quality of work and training on the high-speed rail system, one of China's most ambitious modernizations.
lead_paragraph: The collapsed section raised new doubts about the quality of work and training on the high-speed rail system, one of China’s most ambitious modernizations.

headline.seo: Section of a New Railway Line Collapses in China
headline.main: In China, Part of Railway Collapses Despite Test Runs
headline.print_headline: In China, Part of Railway Collapses Despite Test Runs
